KPS Essentials Aromatherapy Cleansing Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: KPS Essentials

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: *Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, *Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, *Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, *Proprietary Blend of Essential Oils. *Organic Ingredients

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunot
Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
